summary: Simple Guides to modding with various tools.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7]Simple Guides[/size]
[size=3]I've been asked lots and lots of questions over the years about various aspects of modding for TES games using the various tools available. I do not consider myself an expert in any of the tools in these tutorials I write, though I do know a lot about them.

Each guide begins somewhat similar to below.
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29018-1-1356830712.jpg[/img][/center]

When I started doing this (what? 3 or 4 days ago...LOL), I had no plan or method. I was simply providing something I thought was needed. Now I feel it was done haphazhardly. So now I plan on making these guides in a more structured manner. Over the next several days, I will make an outline as to what guide gets written in what order. Once that is done, I'll restucture and rename the files in a sequence that makes sense. If you only check this mod once in a while instead tracking it, the version number will indicate how many guides are currently done.

Feel free to leave a comment or a suggestion about a Simple Guide you'd like to see.[/size]
author: aellis
